properties.address: Banwell Youth & Community Centre, Banwell, Avon BS29 6DB BS29 6DB
properties.description: Shared working space, regular crochet group, book swap and always a warm welcome. Soup & a Roll (12:30 - 13:30)
properties.title: Banwell Public Living Room

properties.description: Warm welcome space, open to all. We offer free WiFi, public computers, printing services, activities, groups and study areas. We also have scales to weigh your baby during opening hours (instructions available). Library membership is not required to use the space, but it is available, providing free access to books, eBooks, eMagazines and eNewspapers, health equipment, language learning , iPad loans and more... For more information on our services, please visit: https://www.somerset.gov.uk/libraries/
properties.title: Burnham-On-Sea Library

properties.address: The For All Healthy Living Centre, Weston-Super-Mare, Avon BS23 3SJ
properties.description: Huge range of books to browse and borrow. Space to read and study. Free events and activities are available, including jigsaws, board games, story time, crafts, digital support, volunteering opportunities. Access to PC's & Wi-Fi. Help available to access council services. Sessions for adults who want to learn to read. Full details on www.n-somerset.gov.uk/libraryevents
properties.title: Healthy Living Centre Library

properties.description: The space is open to all As well as being a warm space we offer free hot drinks and biscuits A Book Exchange Tea & Tech
